dmca.title: Trademark Name Unauthorized Use
dmca.body:
Dear Website Owner: 

           It has come to the attention of Moneygram International,
Inc. and its affiliated entities (collectively "Moneygram") that you are
currently using the Travelers Express name/logo(s) ("Marks") on your
Website located at http://contracts.onecle.com.  As detailed below,
Moneygram demands prompt corrective action to end unauthorized use and
misuse of the Marks by your Web site.

Moneygram is the owner of the U.S. trademark registration for the Marks
used on your Web site.  Moneygram has ownership and the exclusive right
to use the Marks.  Your misuse of the Marks violates Moneygram's
exclusive rights in it trademark under the federal Lanham Act under
Title 15 of the United States Code, Section 1125, among others, and
applicable state law.   

Accordingly, we formally demand that you promptly do the following to
resolve this matter: 

1.)  Cease and desist from all use or intended use of the Marks and
remove any contracts containing the Marks; 

2.)  Refrain from using any Marks owned by Moneygram; and 

3.)  Inform us by responding to this e-mail no later than five days from
the date of this e-mail, that you have complied with the requirements
above.  

Moneygram views this as an extremely serious matter that requires prompt
action by you.  Moneygram has a range of effective legal actions and
other remedies available if you do not promptly comply with its demands.


This e-mail is written without prejudice to any claim for damages or
other relief that Moneygram may have in the event that litigation
against you and your company might prove necessary. 

Sincerely, 


MoneyGram International Legal Team
